00013 #ifndef BDKDDALITZKKPIAMP

00017 
00018 class BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp : public BdkAbsDDalitzAmp {
00019   // Static members: -------------------------------------------
00020 public:
00021   enum Component {KSTARP     = 1,
00022                   PHI        = 2,
00023                   KSTARM     = 4,
00024                   KSTAR1410P = 8,
00025                   KSTAR1410M = 16,
00026                   NONRESP    = 32,
00027                   NONRESM    = 64,
00028                   F2P1525    = 128,
00029                   F0         = 256,
00030                   A0         = 512};
00031 
00032   enum ResType {BWRES = 0,
00033                 A0RES = 1,
00034                 F0RES = 2,
00035                 KPI_SW = 3};
00036   
00037   static int allComponents() {return KSTARP + PHI + KSTARM + KSTAR1410P + 
00038       KSTAR1410M + NONRESP + NONRESM + F2P1525 + F0 + A0;}
00039 
00040   // Instance members: -------------------------------------------
00041 public:
00043   BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp(const char * name, const char * title, 
00044                     BdkDalitzBase * pdf,
00045                     Int_t componentsBit = allComponents(),
00046                     Int_t defaultKstarSpin = SPIN1);
00047   
00048   virtual  ~BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp();
00049    
00050   virtual Double_t efficiency(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) const;
00051   virtual Double_t m12NormRange() const {return 2.0;}
00052   virtual Double_t m13NormRange() const {return 2.0;}
00053   
00054 protected:
00055   
00056   // helpers:
00057   virtual void initResonance();
00058 
00059   virtual RooComplex customME(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, Int_t i) const;
00060   
00061   RooComplex LASS(Double_t s, Int_t i) const; 
00062   RooComplex E791Table(Double_t s) const;
00063   
00064 private:
00065   Int_t _defaultKstarSpin; // default spin of the K*, if want to set to 0
00066 
00067   RooRealVar* _a;           // scattering length
00068   RooRealVar* _r;           // Effective Range
00069   RooRealVar* _B;           // fraction of the background amplitude
00070   RooRealVar* _R;           // resonant amplitude
00071   RooRealVar* _phiB;        // overall background phase
00072   RooRealVar* _phiR;        // overall resonant phase
00073   RooRealVar* _E791;        // to use E791 Table III
00074   
00075   BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp(const BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp & other);
